item.title: U.S. Stocks Decline as Bond Yields Rise and Bitcoin Sets Another Record
item.description: A rise in government bond yields put a pause on a vigorous stock rally that has propelled major indexes to records in recent sessions.

item.title: Natural Gas Futures Give Up a Fraction of Monday's Big Gain
item.description: Natural gas futures close slightly lower following Mondayâ€™s 10% rally, as weather forecasts trend cooler, but not much.

item.title: Comex Gold Settles Lower, Silver Rises
item.description: Comex gold settled 0.4% lower, down for a third consecutive session, and silver rose 0.5%, snapping a two-session losing streak.

item.title: Strengthening of U.S. Dollar Continues To Pressure Commodities
item.description: The U.S. dollar index gained ground, extending its run and pressuring U.S. commodities sold on international markets.

item.title: Elliott Calls for Breakup of Honeywell---One of the Last Conglomerates
item.description: The activist investor, which has amassed a $5 billion stake, is calling for big changes. Honeywell shares were up about 5% on the news.
